page.title: 10 Occupations
page.content: Most parents in our schools have jobs. We found that one in every ten is unemployed. Lichfield is visited by tourists, and many people work in hotels, restaurants and public houses. A large proportion of parents work in factories, offices and in the Industrial Estates. Very few women stay at home. Many have part time jobs in Lichfield. Many women work full time as teachers, nurses, and as typists in banks, building societies and shops. Both men and women travel to other towns for their jobs. In general, the men travel further than the women. The men work as sales representatives and managers of shops and offices. Some own restaurants or work as doctors or nurses. Many people have moved into Lichfield, because their jobs moved to the area.
